description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2023-35633):

1. Download and apply the relevant update for your version of Windows from the following links:
   - For Windows 10 (x64): [KB5033379](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033379)
   - For Windows 11 (x64): [KB5033422](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033422) and others as applicable.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses vulnerabilities that could allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges, potentially compromising system integrity and confidential data.
- Ensure that the appropriate update is selected based on your system’s architecture and build number.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is backed up to prevent data loss during the update installation.
- Verify you are running a supported version of Windows prior to applying the patches.
